translations: n.垃圾电邮；（斯帕姆）午餐肉（Spam）

phrs.translation: 线单颗粒气溶胶质谱仪, 线气溶胶质谱仪, 气溶胶质谱仪, 线源解析产品

sentences.sentence: As we all know, spams have been a very serious issue with Internet.
sentences.translation: 众所周知，垃圾邮件问题已经是当今网络世界的一个严重问题。

sentences.sentence: Tools such as Razor and Pyzor (see Resources) operate around servers that store digests of known spams.
sentences.translation: 象 Razor 和 Pyzor（请参阅 参考资料）这样的工具运行在服务器一端，服务器上存储了一些已知垃圾邮件的摘要。

sentences.sentence: Every day of this month, in contrast, I received many times more spams than I did legitimate correspondences.
sentences.translation: 与此相对照，在这个月中的每一天，我所收到垃圾邮件的数目是合法邮件的很多倍。
